Branded Winners Ribbon (Full Colour)

description: Branded Winners Ribbon with full colour branding printed up to 5 times across the length of the ribbon. Perfect for large scale races, park runs or sports days. UK made printed winners ribbon.Full colour dye sublimation to multiple print areas of your own logo and design.Optional hemmed edges (though not required as the fabric doesn't fray)Minimum order quantity 1 unit.Fast leadtime.Bespoke longer lenghts and heights all considered if you get in touch for pricing.Trusted BMPM® branded supply.Branded Winners Ribbons can feature any company logo or design, whether that's the name of the event, the events sponsors or a mix of the two. Branded Ribbons can also be used at grand openings and ceremonies and are ideal for ribbon cutting. NOTE ON PRINTSPlease select how many print positions you want on your winners ribbon.Each print position is about 60cm wide and can feature 1 or 2 or more logos.A single position print is 60cm wide and usually printed in the centre.If you have 2 or more print positions, we suggest designing with a white space between each logo.Our image demonstrates how a 1 position and 2 position print will look if you have 2 designed logo's within each 60cm print position.Each print position can have the same (for a step repeat look) or totally different designed artwork.Or call us and email your ideas so we can help guide you.

price_changes.title: Branded Fabric Dice (Full Colour) (Foam Filled) 7cm Cubes Mock Suede Polyester Fabric

description: Branded Winners Ribbon with full colour branding printed up to 5 times across the length of the ribbon. Perfect for large scale races, park runs or sports days. UK made printed winners ribbon.Full colour dye sublimation to multiple print areas of your own logo and design.Optional hemmed edges (though not required as the fabric doesn't fray)Minimum order quantity 1 unit.Fast leadtime.Bespoke longer lenghts and heights all considered if you get in touch for pricing.Trusted BMPM® branded supply.Branded Winners Ribbons can feature any company logo or design, whether that's the name of the event, the events sponsors or a mix of the two. Branded Ribbons can also be used at grand openings and ceremonies and are ideal for ribbon cutting. NOTE ON PRINTSPlease select how many print positions you want on your winners ribbon.Each print position is about 60cm wide and can feature 1 or 2 or more logos.A single position print is 60cm wide and usually printed in the centre.If you have 2 or more print positions, we suggest designing with a white space between each logo.Our image demonstrates how a 1 position and 2 position print will look if you have 2 designed logo's within each 60cm print position.Each print position can have the same (for a step repeat look) or totally different designed artwork.Or call us and email your ideas so we can help guide you.
